message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product. I'm happy to start the negotiations at $1,600,000. I believe this price reflects the true value of what's being offered.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking for a price closer to my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $900,000.
Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. I understand your position, but $900,000 is too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,400,000.  I believe this offer represents a fair compromise.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $1,250,000.
